alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 28 at 6:07PM MST until July 28 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northern La Paz County in west central Arizona... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 700 PM MST/700 PM PDT/. * At 606 PM MST/606 PM PDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 15 miles west of Alamo Lake to near Big River to 18 miles northwest of Midland, moving south at 50 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 1 and 29. CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 145 and 156. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 40. Locations impacted include... Parker, Blythe, Quartzsite, Midland, Buckskin Mountain Park, Blythe Airport, Bouse, East Blythe, Ehrenberg and Poston. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
